useCase.name: User Research for Potential Participants
useCase.description: The User Researcher searches for potential participants from NSF staff based on the interview topic and selects them for interviews.

preconditions.precondition: The User Researcher has access to the User Research Management System.

successEndConditions.condition: The User Researcher successfully selects NSF participants for interviews.

failureEndConditions.condition: The User Researcher is unable to find potential participants or they do not respond to the invitation.

useCase.trigger: User Researcher initiates the user research process.

mainSequence.step: User Researcher searches for potential participants in the User Research Management System.
User Researcher selects NSF participants based on relevant expertise.
User Researcher sends invitation emails containing interview details to selected NSF participants.
NSF Person receives the interview invitation and RSVPs.
User Research Management System logs the RSVP status of NSF participants.
User Researcher confirms the RSVP status of NSF participants.
